person.persName: Charles R. Griffith (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, clerk and treasurer )

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, clerk and treasurer of railroad company. Native of England. Married to Elizabeth Griffith c1850. Father of William Griffith, Cara Griffin, Mary Griffin, Ellen Griffin, and Jesse Griffin. Grocer in Louisville, Kentucky in 1850. Clerk in Louisville, Kentucky in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Louisville, Kentucky in 1860. Chief Clerk of Louisville and Nashville Railroad Company in 1861. Treasurer of Louisville and Nashville Railroad Company in 1863. General Book Keeper of Passengers and Freight and Receiving Agent for the Louisville and Nashville Railroad Company in 1864.
